cmderr.generic: An unexpected error occured, check the console for more information.
cmderr.parameter-invalid-value: The value {0} is invalid for parameter {1}.
cmderr.parameter-is-missing: The parameter {0} is missing. Expected syntax: {1}.
cmd.announce.help.description: Send an announcement message in chat to all players.
cmd.directmessage.help.description: Send a private message to another player.
cmd.directmessage.help.param.target.desc: The player to send the message to.
cmd.reply.help.description: Reply to the last private message you received.
cmd.reply.error.no-reply-target: There is no one to reply to.
cmd.back.help.description: Teleport back to your previous location.
cmd.back.teleported: You've been teleported back to your previous location.
cmd.tprandom.error.no-teleport-known: Unable to find a random teleport location.
cmd.tprandom.teleported: You've been teleported to a random location.
cmd.repair.repaired: The item you're holding has been repaired.
cmd.playerlist.help.description: View a list of all online players.
